name: CFM-ID
short_description:
Windows binaries and cross-platform source code for processing of ESI-MS/MS data for identification of metabolites. 

Includes tools for applying Competitive Fragmentation Modeling (CFM) to spectrum prediction and metabolite identification tasks, as well as a tool for fragment generation, and another for peak annotation.

For further documenation see https://sourceforge.net/p/cfm-id/wiki/Home/
 
The related publication is:

Allen, F., Greiner, R., Wishart, D., Competitive Fragmentatation Modeling of ESI-MS/MS spectra for putative metabolite identification, Metabolomics, 11:1, pp 98-110, 2015.

There is also a web server supporting much of this functionality at  http://cfmid.wishartlab.com
summary: Competitive Fragmentation Modeling for Metabolite Identification
